findings.title: FSA - Fixed Swap Address
findings.description: The swap address is assigned once and cannot be changed.

findings.title: PVC - Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: The contract accumulates tokens from taxes to swap them for ETH, which can lead to price volatility.

findings.title: MEE - Missing Events Emission
findings.description: The contract performs actions and state mutations from external methods that do not result in the emission of events.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity and overhead unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables can be declared as immutable using the constant keyword.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity style guide.
